resources.string: Let me know what you think about it :) %1$s
All current progress will be lost
All current progress will be lost
The chapter will end in a few seconds…
Zoe\'s cell phone requires a password.
Video loading to unlock the next chapter
The ad allows you to unlock a chapter
The game will start in a moment
Are you sure you want to leave?
The adventure continues: Two months have passed since you saved Amy. After everything you\'ve done for the Belle family, you begin to realize that something about her is being hidden from you

The anonymous contact was right, you weren\'t able to stop yourself from going back and reading through the messages sent to Eva, and although the night was young and uneventful, it was about to get shaken up
Your conversation has just been interrupted by x92. This person is convinced he is helping you, but should you really trust him? A mistake on your part could lead to bad consequences…
After your conversation with x92, your phone rebooted and didn\'t turn back on for awhile. When it finally does, you discover two messages from Zoe sent an hour ago, one of them hidden
What would you do if everything up to this point never even happened?
On the day of the trip, you\'ve been on the bus with Zoe and her group of friends for several hours already. You are sitting next to Lena, and Zoe seems to be avoiding you.
Walking down to the lake again, ready to meet up with Lucie, you find her already waiting for you there

You\'re all now at the base of the mountain, at an altitude of several hundred feet. Still thinking over your previous decisions, something inside of you hopes that there won\'t be future decisions that you would come to regret
You finally arrive in front of the house of the Belle family with Lucie. You\'ll finally be able to see Eva.

The trip with Zoe is coming up, You realize that this trip will allow you to take a step closer towards getting to know her, but also that you will become more distant to Eva. \n\nYou go back to the lake, a week later, at dawn. Those waters that so often made your eyes gaze off into the distance are now covered by a thick fog that block you from seeing clearly ahead of you, both in reality and metaphorically.

Lucie was right, a couple hours later, the lake was much more of a sight to behold and was creating in you inexplicable emotions. Emotions as inexplicable as Lucie's maturity, and her ability to manipulate conversations as well as stare down the people she would talk to. 

She ended up putting you face to face with an interesting conundrum, that of choosing between Eva and Zoe. 

But what if, in the end, you never even had to choose between those two girls, and that none of this had ever happened. How would you react?

You've decided to go meet Eva instead of leaving with Zoe, Lena, Rick and Marwin 

You're standing in front of that wonderful lake, so dearly loved by the Belle family, lost in thought… You are convinced that the unknown hacker succeeded in putting you back on the path toward Eva, but you're also aware that you're leaving the path that leads to Zoe
Share the game to a friend
There are 2 good ends and 2 bad ends
One end is not enough to understand the whole story
Things get heated at the campfire
The soul on the first floor
